acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This item came to the Library of Virginia in shipments of court papers from Culpeper County.

bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: Culpeper County was formed in 1749 from Orange County.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Will books, 1749-1791, of Culpeper County Court. The will books include the name oftestator, list of heirs, and year the wills were proven in court. They also include probate records such as inventories and appraisements. Will Book B does not have an index.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Additional Culpeper County Will Books can be found on microfilm at the Library of Virginia. See the Guide to Virginia County and City Records on Microfilm

Culpeper County is one of Virginia's Lost Records Localities. Additional Culpeper County Court Records may be found in the Virginia Lost Records Localities Collection at the Library of Virginia. Search the Lost Records Localities Database found at the Library of Virginia web site.
